document_data.mainbody:
anternmaker Zorth Ulmarils shop was located in Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The building stood two storys tall.
The shop was located in Waterdeeps Dock Ward on Presper Street just south of the end of Bitter Alley.
The shop was owned by its namesake, Zorth Ulmaril, in the .
